data.quote: We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: How can the past and future be, when the past no longer is, and the future is not yet? As for the present, if it were always present and never moved on to become the past, it would not be time, but eternity.
data.author: Augustine of Hippo

data.quote: You didn’t come into this world. You came out of it, like a wave from the ocean. You are not a stranger here.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: The worst loneliness is to not be comfortable with yourself.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Men travel to wonder at the height of the mountains, at the huge waves of the seas, at the long course of the rivers, at the vast compass of the ocean, at the circular motion of the stars, and yet they pass by themselves without wondering.
data.author: Augustine of Hippo

data.quote: Life exists only at this very moment, and in this moment it is infinite and eternal, for the present moment is infinitely small; before we can measure it, it has gone, and yet it exists forever...
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: There will always be suffering. But we must not suffer over the suffering.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.
data.author: Augustine of Hippo

data.quote: Life is a journey, not a destination
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Every individual is a unique manifestation of the Whole, as every branch is a particular outreaching of the tree.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: The most important conversations you’ll ever have are the ones you’ll have with yourself.
data.author: David Goggins

data.quote: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment. Fools stand on their island of opportunities and look toward another land. There is no other land; there is no other life but this.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: But I’ll tell you what hermits realize. If you go off into a far, far forest and get very quiet, you’ll come to understand that you’re connected with everything.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: When you get free from certain fixed concepts of the way the world is, you find it is far more subtle, and far more miraculous, than you thought it was.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: The punishment of every disordered mind is its own disorder.
data.author: Augustine of Hippo

data.quote: After I'm dead, I'd rather people ask why I have no monument than why I have one.
data.author: Cato the Elder

data.quote: Meditation is the discovery that the point of life is always arrived at in the immediate moment.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: The Buddha famously said that life is suffering. I’m not a Buddhist, but I know what he meant and so do you. To exist in this world, we must contend with humiliation, broken dreams, sadness, and loss. That’s just nature. Each specific life comes with its own personalized portion of pain. It’s coming for you. You can’t stop it. And you know it.
data.author: David Goggins
